DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to assess the prevalence of Metabolic Syndrome in Italy on a regional basis, defined according to NCEP/ATPIII Guidelines criteria.
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Syndrome Observation on a Regional Basis
DOC.criteria: Patient aged between 18 and 75 years Signed Informed consent Laboratory analysis (lipidic profile and glycemia) performed in the last year Pregnancy or breast feeding Patients enrolled in clinical studies which the aim is to evaluate the efficacy and/or tolerability of antihypertensive and/or lipid lowering drugs Subjects with serious or unstable medical or psychological conditions that, in the opinion of the investigator, would compromise the subject's successful participation in the study
